scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack. The attacker aims to identify high-value customers based on their predicted churn probability, potentially for targeted phishing or fraud.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to model inversion attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: Customer relationship management (CRM) system using a machine learning model to predict customer churn probability.  The model is trained on sensitive customer data including age, income, transaction history, and location.
